title: Video Game Metal Remixes (Nintendo)
description:
*****BE SURE TO SCAN EVERY FILE YOU DOWNLOAD FROM THEPIRATEBAY*****


Ever wonder what the Song of Storms from The Legend of Zelda would sound like when played by a heavy metal band?
Ever think that the Pokemon R/B/Y battle music could use more electric guitar?

Love old Nintendo game music?


This is just a collection of some heavy metal remixes/covers of some tunes from some old Nintendo games (and X-Com: UFO Defence/UFO: Enemy Unknown).

Most of these are ripped straight from YouTube videos, so the quality isn't the best, but some of the artists were kind enough to have a download link to the .MP3 from various file hosting services (and 2 of the songs are from the Newgrounds Audio Portal).

Some information may be incorrect, and the track list isn't organized by game, for the most part.


TRACK LIST

01 - Mad Monster Mansion - Banjo-Kazooie
02 - In The Hall of the Zombie King - Banjo-Tooie
03 - The Song of Time - The Legend of Zelda
04 - The Song of Storms - The Legend of Zelda
05 - Gerudo Valley - The Legend of Zelda
06 - Interceptor - X-Com/UFO: EU
07 - Donkey Kong Country - Donkey Kong Country
08 - Final Bowser - Super Mario 64
09 - Banjo-Kazooie Theme - Banjo-Kazooie
10 - Gobi's Valley - Banjo-Kazooie
11 - Pokemon R/B/Y Gym Battle - Pokemon R/B/Y
12 - Mario/Zelda Medley - Super Mario Bros./The Legend of Zelda
13 - Zelda NES Dungeon - The Legend of Zelda
14 - Tetris - Tetris
15 - Brinstar - Super Metroid

Total length: 38:42 (May be incorrect, because my media player doesn't read the lengths correctly. For example, Brinstar is a bit more than 5:00, but Windows Media Player says it is 3:06.)

About 33.4MB total

*Since I'm so awesome, I didn't pack these in a .RAR, so you can choose what you want downloaded.



*****SEED OR DIE*****


Check this torrent out for more awesome metal remixes:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3830439/powerglove_2_albums
*The Tetris theme I included is from Powerglove, which I just learned.*
